inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of asthma and COPD per guidelines
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: for asthma, persistent symptoms per guidelines
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: for asthma, a pre-bronchodilator FEV1 55-90% and DLCO 80% predicted
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: for COPD, a post-bronchodilator ratio of FEV1/FVC 70% and FEV1 50%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: overall smoking history of <10 pack-years for asthma and 10 pack-years for COPD
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: any use of inhaled corticosteroid for >2 weeks at a time during the last 6 months, or
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: as needed use of nasal steroids in the prior 6 months
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: recent exacerbation requiring oral or systemic steroids in the past 6 months
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: other lung diseases (lung cancer, sarcoidosis, tuberculosis, lung fibrosis) or known
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: significant or actively unstable medical or psychiatric illnesses
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of COPD and asthma, but also uses inhaled corticosteroids. They have had recent exacerbations requiring oral steroids.
